TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit StylusPlugIn extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示可添加到控件的 属性中的插件。

span.span: Represents a plug-in that can be added to a control's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许您处理单独的线程上的对象。The allows you to manipulate objects on separate threads. 使用单独的线程，这样手写内容仍将呈现为 tablet 笔输入数据即使应用程序执行其他操作。Separate threads are used so that the ink still renders as the tablet pen inputs data even if the application is doing something else. 若要截获从硬件的触笔接触点，创建继承的类类。To intercept stylus points from the hardware, create a class that inherits from the class. 类具有以下方法可以重写操作线程池在笔线程上的对象。The class has the following methods that you can override to manipulate objects on a thread in the pen thread pool. - - - - - 笔输入路由到元素的笔线程上。The pen's input is routed to an element's on the pen thread. 因为不能在笔线程上执行准确的命中测试，某些元素可能会偶尔收到适用于其他元素的触笔输入。Since accurate hit-testing cannot be performed on the pen thread, some elements might occasionally receive stylus input intended for other elements. 如果你需要确保输入已正确路由正在执行的操作之前，订阅并执行中的操作， ，或方法。If you need to make sure the input was routed correctly before performing an operation, subscribe to and perform the operation in the , , or method. 在执行准确的命中测试后，主应用程序线程将调用这些方法。These methods are invoked by the main application thread after accurate hit-testing has been performed. 若要订阅对这些方法，调用在笔线程发生的方法中的方法。To subscribe to these methods, call the method in the method that occurs on the pen thread. 例如，如果您调用中，则时发生。For example, if you call in , the occurs. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用内一个控件，应测试插件，并广泛地控制以确保它们不会引发任何意外的异常。If you use a inside a control, you should test the plug-in and control extensively to make sure they do not throw any unintended exceptions. ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 在 XAML 中通常不使用此类。This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个自定义约束在控件上的特定区域的墨迹。The following example creates a custom that constrains the ink to a certain area on the control. [!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/FilterPlugin.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/FilterPlugin.vb#1)]
